Project.h1: Construction of National Legal Training Centre
Project.p: The project aims to construct an educational building composed of three floors of lecture halls, offices, conference rooms, and utilities. It will support the higher education services and the crucial extension of recently established faculty of law and assist in responding to the increasing demand from the community for such education discipline in the University of Obari. The beneficiaries of the project are about 420 from 920 students of the faculty, 2019/2020 data, including 280 female students and the faculty staff and officers.
تعلن ادارة المدرسة الي جميع المعلمين التابعين لها بأن غدا الخميس هو أخر يوم لتعبئة نموذج بيانات العاملين بالمدرسة .
